EmailTemplate.name: Rescheduling/Demo Ghosted - Day 18
EmailTemplate.subject: Re-book your demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} ,
I’d love to get that demo with you back on the books! Please click here to schedule it: [Meeting Link]
Our award-winning website designs and expert marketing solutions have helped thousands of real estate agents grow their businesses.
Let’s build you a unique and memorable personal brand so you can stand out in a competitive market and generate more leads.
Hope to hear back from you soon.
Best, {!User.Name}
